sentences.english: Due to the break of the relationship with Shao Meiqi, Zheng Yijian has come in for a barrage of criticism.
sentences.chinese: 由于和邵美琪关系破裂，郑伊健接受了一大堆批评。

sentences.english: Cheng and Leung said they would never be embarrassed to have their pictures taken together.
sentences.chinese: 郑伊健和梁咏琪表示不会为合照而感到尴尬。
